Kural_Info.Chapter: இனியவை கூறல் (The Utterance of Pleasant Words)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இன்சொல் இனிதீன்றல் காண்பான் எவன்கொலோவன்சொல் வழங்கு வது.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Why does he use harsh words, who sees the pleasure which sweet speech yields?

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person stands at a crossroads, looking perplexed. In their right hand, they hold a single, beautiful, glowing flower, representing a 'sweet word' ('இன்சொல்'). They can clearly see that this flower brings light and joy ('இனிது ஈன்றல்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Despite this, in their left hand, they are holding a sharp, ugly, thorny rock, representing a 'harsh word' ('வன்சொல்'). They seem to be inexplicably choosing to offer the rock instead of the flower.
Layered_Composition.Background: The path to the right (associated with the flower) leads to a bright, happy landscape. The path to the left (associated with the rock) leads to a dark, sorrowful one. The person's illogical choice is the central mystery.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual representation of the illogical and self-defeating choice of using harsh words when one has clearly seen the beautiful and beneficial results of using sweet words.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The flower (sweet word) vs. the thorny rock (harsh word) is a simple, powerful metaphor. The person's confused or foolish expression highlights the irrationality of their choice, directly posing the Kural's question: 'Evankolo?' (Why on earth?).
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The right side of the image, with the flower, is bathed in a warm, pleasant light. The left side, with the rock, is cast in a harsh, ugly shadow. The person stands in the middle of this conflicting light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A direct, eye-level shot of the person, making the viewer confront their illogical choice.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with strong textural contrast between the soft flower and the sharp rock.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, symbolic lighting to emphasize the choice between good and bad.

Cultural_Anchors: The pleasure from sweet words (இன்சொல் இனிது ஈன்றல்)
The use of harsh words (வன்சொல் வழங்குவது)
